title: Map of the march route

title: View of the gradient of William Street, from Great Pulteney Street to the Rec

alt: Bath Recreation Ground (flat)
title: Bath Recreation Ground (flat)

alt: START of the Pride March Route (upward gradient up William Street to then turn left down Great Pulteney Street)
title: START of the Pride March Route (upward gradient up William Street to then turn left down Great Pulteney Street)

alt: Walk down Great Pulteney Street towards the Laura Place Fountain
title: Walk down Great Pulteney Street towards the Laura Place Fountain

alt: Walk down Argyle Street, over Pulteney Bridge
title: Walk down Argyle Street, over Pulteney Bridge

alt: Turn left at the traffic lights opposite Guildhall
title: Turn left at the traffic lights opposite Guildhall

alt: Walk down Grand Parade (past Pulteney Weir)
title: Walk down Grand Parade (past Pulteney Weir)

alt: Turn right, between Parade Gardens and The Empire Hotel
title: Turn right, between Parade Gardens and The Empire Hotel

alt: Turn right around Orange Grove, past the taxi rank at the back of the Abbey
title: Turn right around Orange Grove, past the taxi rank at the back of the Abbey

alt: Turn left, around the Abbey and towards the city centre shops
title: Turn left, around the Abbey and towards the city centre shops

alt: Walk down Cheap Street until you see the Costa on your left, where Cheap Street meets Stall Street and Union Street
title: Walk down Cheap Street until you see the Costa on your left, where Cheap Street meets Stall Street and Union Street

alt: Walk up Union Street until it meets the Upper Borough Walls (uphill, take care and pace yourselves as needed)
title: Walk up Union Street until it meets the Upper Borough Walls (uphill, take care and pace yourselves as needed)

alt: Stop at the top of Union Street, ready to turn right
title: Stop at the top of Union Street, ready to turn right

alt: Turn right onto Upper Borough Walls
title: Turn right onto Upper Borough Walls

alt: Walk all the way down Upper Borough Walls
title: Walk all the way down Upper Borough Walls

alt: Be wary of uneven paving in this area
title: Be wary of uneven paving in this area

alt: Cross the road and head down Bridge Street
title: Cross the road and head down Bridge Street

alt: This brings us back in a loop to Pulteney Bridge and Argyle Street
title: This brings us back in a loop to Pulteney Bridge and Argyle Street

alt: Walk back down Argyle Street towards the Laura Place Fountain
title: Walk back down Argyle Street towards the Laura Place Fountain

alt: Walk past the Laura Place Fountain and back onto Great Pulteney Street
title: Walk past the Laura Place Fountain and back onto Great Pulteney Street
